property.name: fs.s3a.access.key
property.description: AWS access key ID used by S3A file system. Omit for IAM role-based or provider-based authentication.

property.name: fs.s3a.secret.key
property.description: AWS secret key used by S3A file system. Omit for IAM role-based or provider-based authentication.

property.name: fs.s3a.endpoint
property.description: AWS Simple Token Service Endpoint. If unset, uses the default endpoint. Only used if AssumedRoleCredentialProvider is the AWS credential provider.
